title: Autorité des marchés financiers gives to Gestion PR Maintenance Inc.. the authorization to enter into contracts with public bodies
text:
PR Maintenance
TERREBONNE, QC , Oct. 8 , 2015 /CNW Telbec/ - The Director of AMF, Autorité des marchés financiers, has delivered, to the above mentioned company, and its affiliated entities, the authorization to enter into contracts or subcontracts with public bodies, Québec government departments and agencies, and Québec municipalities under An Act respecting the Autorité des marchés financiers.
UPAC, Unité permanente anti-corruption, has the responsibility to exam the integrity of each company submitting an AMF authorization application. To conduct such an extensive audit they must exchange information with the Sûreté du Québec, Revenu Québec, the Commission de construction du Québec and other entities. As expected, no loopholes were reported in Gestion PR Maintenance inc. business practices.
Gestion PR Maintenance inc. and its affiliate entities are now registered in the IPCA list of companies to whom an authorization have been delivered enabling them to conclude contracts and subcontracts with public bodies, Québec government departments and agencies, and Québec municipalities, as per government fixed thresholds for each organism, for a three-year period.
Aéroports de Montréal, before according their trust to Gestion PR Maintenance inc. for their maintenance contract, did perform their own complete investigation. This, plus the AMF authorization, clearly shows PR Maintenance inc. transparency and accountability. From now on, their superior quality services, already available to major companies, will be offered to public contracting authorities.
« Honesty, transparency and integrity are inherent values on which all of Gestion PR Maintenance inc.' employees stand behind. I am proud of this public recognition coming from an independent body. » - Pierre Robitaille , Founding President of Gestion PR Maintenance Inc.
To learn more about Gestion PR Maintenance inc., visit: www.prmaintenance.com/en
